backend/main.mo: Empty actor canister with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file documenting deployment of Draft Version 6 and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for various frontend files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with extensive OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering header, hero, category grid, order form, and contact sections with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of five crochet item categories using static image assets.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders contact card with email and Instagram links and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/OrderNowForm.tsx: Full order form handling validation, email generation, mailto, and clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Shows four value‑proposition cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, clearing identity, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file indicating backend queries are not used and all actions occur client‑side.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode theming, typography, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, issues, and build instructions for the CraftyMini site.
